ntf.element_now_available_on_date: This element is now "available on date".
ntf.err_post_reported: This post has already been reported.
ntf.co_req_removed: You are no longer connected to {{username}}.
ntf.err_doc_loading: An error has occurred while loading the document.
ntf.err_img_loading: An error has occurred while loading the image.
ntf.err_file_size: The maximum file size limit for uploads is {{maxsize}} MB. Please try with another file.
ntf.err_file_upload: An error has occurred while uploading the file
ntf.page_join: You are now a member of this {{pagetype}}.
ntf.page_apply: Your application has been successfully submitted.
ntf.page_cancel_apply: Your application has been successfully cancelled.
ntf.info_updated: Your personal information has been updated.
ntf.err_hangout_connect: An error has occured while connecting. Please try again.
ntf.err_hangout_people_busy: The participants are unable to answer your call right now.
ntf.err_hangout_user_busy: {{username}} is unable to answer your call right now
ntf.err_hangout_cam_sharing: An error has occured while sharing your camera. Please make sure your camera is not being used by another app and try again.
ntf.err_hangout_mic_sharing: An error has occured while sharing your microphone. Please make sure your microphone is not being used by another app and try again.
ntf.err_hangout_unsupported: Hangouts are not supported by your current browser. Please use the latest version of Chrome or Firefox.
ntf.password_reset: You will shortly receive an email to reset your password.
ntf.admin_customfield_updated: The custom field has successfully been updated
ntf.err_user_import: An error has occurred while importing: {{error}}
ntf.err_already_signin: You already use this link to finalize your account creation.
ntf.err_invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address.
ntf.err_signin_state: An error has occured. It seems there is no account to create.
ntf.err_linkedin_auth: An error has occured while getting Linkedin authorizations
ntf.err_linkedin_signup: An error has occured. Your LinkedIn account is not related to any TWIC account. If you want to be able to connect via linkedin, please go in your settings and grant linkedin access.

confidentiality.public_hint: Anyone can join, see the {{ label }}, its ressources, its members and their posts.
confidentiality.closed_hint: Anyone can find the {{ label }} and send a request to join. Only members can see posts and ressources
confidentiality.secret_hint: Only invited people can join. Only members can find the club and see the posts and ressources.
